name: Outplayed Backup File
summary: An OPB file is a backup file created by Overwolf Outplayed, a video-capturing app for gamers. It contains a copy of a user's Outplayed videos, settings, and other data. Users can create and restore OPB files from the Storage screen of Outplayed's Settings menu.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: OPB file open in Overwolf Outplayed
images.alt: OPB file open in Overwolf Outplayed
